org.apache.sshd.common.util.logging

Class AbstractLoggingBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sshd.common.util.logging.AbstractLoggingBean
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAgentClient, AbstractAgentProxy, AbstractConnectionServiceRequestHandler, AbstractDHKeyExchange, AbstractIoServiceFactoryFactory, AbstractKeyPairProvider, AbstractRequestHandler, AbstractScpClient, AbstractSessionIoHandler, AbstractSftpClientExtension, AbstractSftpEventListenerAdapter, AbstractSftpFileAttributeView, AbstractSimpleClient, AbstractSshFuture, AbstractSubsystemClient, AbstractUserAuth, AbstractUserAuth, AbstractUserAuthMethodFactory, AbstractUserAuthServiceFactory, AgentServer, AgentServerProxy, AgentServerProxy, DefaultKeyboardInteractiveAuthenticator, DelegatingServerKeyVerifier, InvertedShellWrapper, IoBaseCloseable, JaasPasswordAuthenticator, KeySetPublickeyAuthenticator, LocalFileScpSourceStreamResolver, LocalFileScpTargetStreamResolver, ModifiableFileWatcher, NativeFileSystemFactory, PipeDataReceiver, ProcessShell, ProcessShellFactory, RequiredServerKeyVerifier, ScpCommand, ScpHelper, SessionTimeoutListener, SftpDirEntryIterator, SftpSubsystem, StandardEnvironment, StaticDecisionForwardingFilter, StaticHostBasedAuthenticator, StaticPasswordAuthenticator, StaticPublickeyAuthenticator, StaticServerKeyVerifier, Window

    public abstract class AbstractLoggingBean
extends Object
    Serves as a common base class for the vast majority of classes that require some kind of logging. Facilitates quick and easy replacement of the actual used logger from one framework to another
    Author:
    Apache MINA SSHD Project

      protected AbstractLoggingBean()
      Default constructor - creates a logger using the full class name
      protected AbstractLoggingBean(String discriminator)
      Create a logger for instances of the same class for which we might want to have a "discriminator" for them
